texts: Each Member State shall ensure that its supervisory authority member of the Board and the alternate, where such alternate is appointed, perform their duties and exercise their powers in accordance with this Regulation. Each Member State shall ensure that its supervisory authority member of the Board and the alternate, remain free from external influence, whether direct or indirect, and shall neither seek nor take instructions from anybody. The Member State concerned shall not seek to influence the member of the Board or the alternate in the performance of their tasks.
